Welcome To Tamu Sana Restaraunt

Home

Tamu Sana is a Modern Restaraunt based on the shores of Mombasa County which is a city in Kenya. The beaty of Tamu Sana is you get to enjoy your meals as you catch the waves from the comfort of your chair. As it is close to the ocean, you get fresher and moist sea foods hence why it is the number one spot in the area.
